note:
Software developer turned user experience designer. Loves to make sense of complex things.

Québécois in the Ottawa area.

I don't like Tim Horton's unless I have to drive for hours

I don't really care about hockey. But I enjoy watching hockey or football if I have good company to do so.

Je suis un francophone qui travailles en anglais depuis plus de 30 ans. La majorité de mon réseau est anglophone ce qui explique pourquoi j'écris en anglais.
